mapper.select: select btitle, bname, bdate, bhit from (select rownum rn, bid, m.name as bname, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bhit from board_notice, member m where m.userid=bname order by bid desc) where rn<=3

select btitle, bname, bdate, bhit from (select rownum rn, bid, m.name as bname, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bhit from board_qna, member m where m.userid=bname and bindent=0 order by bid desc) where rn<=3
